info.title: Baas Pix
info.description:
**Description**: Api responsible to managing pix keys and pix transfers ## Key kind
Kind Description
`CELLPHONE` Cellphone number.
`CPF` CPF number.
`CNPJ` CNPJ number.
`EMAIL` E-mail address.
`VIRTUAL` Random key.
# Errors Account Middleware uses [HTTP response status codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_HTTP_status_codes) to indicate the success or failure of your API requests. In general, there are three status code ranges you can expect: - `2xx` success status codes confirm that your request worked as expected - `4xx` error status codes indicate an error because of the information provided (e.g., a required parameter was not provided) - `5xx` error status codes are rare and indicate an error with R4's servers ## HTTP Status code summary Extracted from [Stripe API codes](https://stripe.com/docs/api/errors) - `200 - OK` Everything worked as expected. - `400 - Bad Request` The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter. - `401 - Unauthorized` No valid API key provided. - `403 - Forbidden` The API key doesn't have permissions to perform the request. - `404 - Not Found` The requested resource doesn't exist. - `429 - Too Many Requests` Too many requests hit the API too quickly. We recommend an exponential backoff of your requests. - `500, 502, 503, 504 - Server Errors` Something went wrong on R4's end. ## Error codes Below is a list of possible error codes that can be returned: | Code | Description | |-------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------| | `ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND` | Account not found | | `APPLICATION_PRODUCT_NOT_FOUND` | Product not found for given application id | | `AUTHENTICATION_FAILED` | Authentication failed | | `CLAIM_ALREADY_BELONGS_TO_CLIENT` | The key already belongs to the client | | `CLAIM_ALREADY_DONE` | Claim was already completed | | `CLAIM_ALREADY_OPEN` | There is some claim with status different of done or cancelled for the revindicated key | | `CLAIM_CANCELATION_REASON_INVALID` | The reason to cancel your claim is not valid | | `CLAIM_CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED` | The status of your claim does not allow for its cancellation | | `CLAIM_CANNOT_BE_COMPLETED_BY_GRANTOR` | Claim cannot be completed by grantor | | `CLAIM_CANNOT_BE_CONFIRMED_BY_CLAIMER` | The claim cannot be confirmed by claimer | | `CLAIM_CANNOT_COMPLETE` | The status of your claim does not allow for its conclusion | | `CLAIM_INVALID` | There are an invalid field at creation of the claim | | `CLAIM_KEY_NOT_FOUND` | There is no registered bond to the key being claimed | | `CLAIM_NOT_FOUND` | The provided claim was not found or does not exist | | `CLAIM_TYPE_INCONSISTENT` | The requested claim type is inconsistent | | `ENTRY_LOCKED_BY_CLAIM` | There is a claim with a status other than completed or canceled for the key | | `INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR` | Unexpected error with our service | | `INVALID_CELLPHONE` | The provided cellphone is not valid | | `INVALID_CNPJ` | The provided CNPJ is not valid | | `INVALID_CPF` | The provided CPF is not valid | | `INVALID_DATA` | The data provided has an invalid format | | `INVALID_EMAIL` | The provided email is not valid | | `KEY_ALREADY_EXISTS` | There is already a bond for this key with the same participant and owner | | `KEY_DATA_INCOMPLETE` | Incomplete data for key change. Inform "account type, account number and date and time of opening of the new account" and/or "name and nickname" | | `KEY_IN_CUSTODY_OF_DIFFERENT_PARTICIPANT` | There is already a bond for this key with other participant and owner. It is indicated a claim of ownership | | `KEY_MISSING_ACCOUNT_OR_CUSTOMER` | It is necessary to inform a new account and/or customer name to change the address key | | `KEY_NICKNAME_INVALID` | The key to be changed does not accept nickname, as it is associated with the individual person type | | `KEY_NOT_FOUND` | The provided key is not found or does not exist | | `KEY_SAME_DOCUMENT_DIFFERENT_PSP` | This key is already linked to this document number, but in another PSP. Portability is recommended | | `KEY_WITH_DIFFERENT_ACCOUNT` | There is already a link for this key on with the same owner and other account information. A key change is indicated | | `KEY_WITH_SAME_DATA_INFORMED` | Data informed for key change is the same as the current data | | `MISSING_PRODUCT_PERMISSION` | Missing product permission | | `NO_KEY_LINKED_TO_ACCOUNT` | There arent key linked to the account informed | | `NO_KEY_LINKED_TO_DOCUMENT_NUMBER` | There arent key linked to the document number informed | | `PARTNERS_NOT_FOUND` | Partners was not found | | `RECEIVED_CLAIM_CANCELATION_RASON_INVALID` | The reason to cancel the claim you received is not valid | | `RECEIVED_CLAIM_CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED` | The status of the ownership claim you received does not allow for its cancellation | | `RECEIVED_CLAIM_CANNOT_BE_CONFIRMED` | The status of the claim you received, does not allow confirmation | | `RECEIVED_CLAIM_CONFIRM_REASON_INVALID` | The reason for confirming the claim you received is not valid | | `RECEIVED_OWNERSHIP_CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED` | The portability status you received does not allow its cancellation | | `UNAUTHORIZED` | Unauthorized | | `UNEXPECTED_ERROR` | Unexpected error with our service | | `VALIDATION_FAILED` | Invalid request data | | `INVALID_IDEMPOTENCE_KEY` | Idempotence Key is missing or is not a valid uuid. |
